name: Exclusivo apt. en centro histórico · AC · Wifi
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Situated in the centre of Valencia, 400 metres from Church of Saint Nicolás and 600 metres from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Exclusivo apt. En centro histórico · AC · Wifi offers free WiFi and air conditioning. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The apartment has family rooms.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a patio. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Exclusivo apt. En centro histórico · AC · Wifi include Jardines de Monforte, Turia Gardens and González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Melia Valencia
description_short: Private suite • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 50m²
description:
This modern Melia hotel is next to Valencia’s Palacio de Congresos Congress Centre and 5 km from the AVE Train Station. Beniferri Metro Station is just 400 metres away.

The spacious rooms feature contemporary design and offer spectacular views and a 49' flat-screen satellite TV. All are air conditioned and have free WiFi and modern bathrooms.

The hotel has a play area for children. Meeting rooms are available.  Some areas of the hotel are dedicated to The Level rooms and exclusive services, such as a private check-in and check-out area, exclusive buffet breakfast, daily snacks and drinks in a private area, as well as concierge service and organization of activities in the hotel. city.

Manises International Airport is just 15 minutes’ drive from the Melia Valencia.

The hotel's Socarrat restaurant specializes in Valencian paellas, as well as Mediterranean and international cuisine. The Oval Bar has a small snack and drink menu for every hour of the day.

name: Hotel RH Sorolla Centro
description:
Located on a pedestrian street, this hotel is 200 metres from Valencia Train Station, and just 50 metres from Plaza del Ayuntamiento Square. It offers modern rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and free WiFi.

Bicycle and car rental can be arranged at the Sorolla’s 24-hour reception. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Valencia.

Buffet breakfast is offered everyday from 7:30 to 11:00. There are also many shops within a short walk of the hotel.

The central location of the Sorolla Centro allows guests to visit many of Valencia’s sights by foot. Xativa Metro Station is just 200 metres away.

name: Flatsforyou Turia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 50m²
description:
Located 800 metres from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados in Valencia, Flatsforyou Turia provides accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi.

The apartment provides guests with a balcony, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge, and a private bathroom with shower.

Popular points of interest near Flatsforyou Turia include Jardines de Monforte, Turia Gardens and González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The nearest airport is Valencia, 10 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Valencia Luxury - Sea Port II
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
In the Camins al Grau district of Valencia, close to Puerto de Valencia, Valencia Luxury - Sea Port II has a rooftop pool and a washing machine. Featuring private check-in and check-out, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. Offering free WiFi throughout the property, the non-smoking apartment features a fitness room.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. A flat-screen TV is featured. The property offers city views.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Popular points of interest near Valencia Luxury - Sea Port II include Turia Gardens, L'Oceanografic and Mestalla Stadium. The nearest airport is Valencia, 12 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: CAPSULE INN VALENCIA
description_short: Shared dormitory room
description:
Well located in the Extramurs district of Valencia, CAPSULE INN VALENCIA is situated 1.7 km from Church of Saint Nicolás, 2.8 km from Turia Gardens and 1.5 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from Norte Train Station.

Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a dishwasher, a microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The rooms include a shared bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen.

Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 1.8 km from the capsule hotel, while Jardines de Monforte is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from CAPSULE INN VALENCIA.

name: Lore Loft Valencia
description:
Situated in Valencia, 3 km from Malvarrosa Beach and 1.4 km from Puerto de Valencia, Lore Loft Valencia offers air conditioning. The property is around 3.1 km from Turia Gardens, 3.4 km from Jardines de Monforte and 1.9 km from L'Oceanografic. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Playa de las Arenas is 2.4 km away.

Located on the ground floor, this apartment has 1 bedroom, a well-equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a living room, and a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Norte Train Station is 3.9 km from the apartment, while González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 4.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from Lore Loft Valencia.

name: FLORIT FLATS - The Serreria Rooms
description:
Situated in Valencia, 1.2 km from Playa de las Arenas, FLORIT FLATS - The Serreria Rooms features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. There is a private entrance at the guest house for the convenience of those who stay. The guest house has family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the guest house, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

For guests with children, the guest house offers a baby safety gate.

Malvarrosa Beach is 1.5 km from FLORIT FLATS - The Serreria Rooms, while Patacona Beach is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia, 12 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Albergue Juvenil Colegio Mayor Galileo Galilei
description:
The Galileo Galilei hall of residence, next to the Universidad Politécnica de Valencia and Tarongers Metro Station, offers well-priced, spacious accommodation with a fitness centre. All rooms have free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom.

The rooms in Colegio Mayor Galileo Galilei are decorated in a unique style. All rooms have a seating area as well as a work area. Children under 12 stay for free when using existing bedding.

The Colegio Mayor Galileo Galilei has a games room and 24-hour reception. It also has a shared kitchen for guests where they can cook.

The residence is about 1 km from the beach. Its proximity to the Metro means you can quickly reach Valencia city centre.

name: Best Valencia Beach Flat Historic Area next to the Beach
description:
Set in Valencia, 800 metres from Playa de las Arenas, Best Valencia Beach Flat Historic Area next to the Beach offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. This sustainable apartment is located less than 1 km from Malvarrosa Beach and 1.9 km from Patacona Beach. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a patio. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units include bed linen and towels.

A car rental service is available at Best Valencia Beach Flat Historic Area next to the Beach.

Puerto de Valencia is 1.5 km from the accommodation, while Turia Gardens is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from Best Valencia Beach Flat Historic Area next to the Beach.

name: Bet Apartments - Reig
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Located in Valencia, less than 1 km from Jardines de Monforte, Bet Apartments - Reig provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. This sustainable aparthotel is located 1.3 km from Turia Gardens and 2.9 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The aparthotel features family rooms.

Each unit is equipped with a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a seating area, a TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units include bed linen.

Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 1.9 km from the aparthotel, while Norte Train Station is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from Bet Apartments - Reig.

name: Travel Habitat La Marina Real
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Ideally situated in the Poblats Maritims district of Valencia, Travel Habitat La Marina Real is situated 2.5 km from Malvarrosa Beach, 500 metres from Puerto de Valencia and 3.3 km from L'Oceanografic. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Playa de las Arenas is 1.4 km away.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance of the property. A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Turia Gardens is 3.8 km from Travel Habitat La Marina Real, while Jardines de Monforte is 4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Eurostars Rey Don Jaime
description:
Eurostars Rey Don Jaime is located opposite the pretty River Túria Gardens and Valencia's Palau de la Música. It features a roof top terrace with a pool and free WiFi throughout.

The impressive 14-floor tower of the Rey Don Jaime offers rooms with air conditioning, heating and satellite TV for an extra cost. All rooms have a large wardrobe.

The City of Arts and Sciences can be reached in around 15 minutes, on foot from the hotel. Valencia’s seafront and the closest beach are 3.6 km away. The local bus 19 stops at the corner of Eurostars Rey Don Jaime and connects with the city centre and the beach.

name: Palau Apartments Valencia
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 28m²
description:
Less than 1 km from Turia Gardens, Palau Apartments Valencia is a recently renovated property located in Valencia and provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. This sustainable aparthotel is located 1.7 km from Jardines de Monforte and 2.1 km from Norte Train Station. The aparthotel features family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the area. A bicycle rental service is available at the aparthotel.

González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 1.8 km from Palau Apartments Valencia, while Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Medium Valencia
description:
Situated 700 metres from Valencia's impressive City of Arts and Sciences, this design hotel offers a gym and seasonal outdoor pool. The spacious rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

Each air-conditioned room at the Medium Valencia has wooden floors and elegant modern décor. Each one has a private bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. Some have views of the spectacular City of Arts and Sciences.

Mediterranean cuisine served in Hotel Medium Valencia’s on-site restaurant. The hotel also has a lounge bar in the lobby.

The Medium Valencia is around 2.5 km from the historic centre of Valencia, and 4 km from the city’s beaches. The hotel offers private on-site parking, and frequent bus services stop nearby.

name: Hotel San Lorenzo Boutique
description:
Located 100 metres from the Turia Gardens, in Valencia’s Old Town, Hotel San Lorenzo Boutique offers stylish rooms with free WiFi. The hotel is 200 metres from Torre de Serranos City Gate.

Featuring free WiFi, each spacious air-conditioned room has a minibar, flat-screen TV and views of the city. The private bathroom includes a bath or shower, hairdryer and free toiletries.

Hotel San Lorenzo Boutique has a 24-hour reception, as well as a ticket service and tour desk. Bike rental and car can be organised for you, and an airport shuttle service is available.

The Lonja de Seda Silk Exchange and Valencia Central Market are less than 10 minutes’ walk away from the hotel. Norte Train Station is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Mythic Valencia
description:
Conveniently located in the La Saidia district of Valencia, Mythic Valencia is set 1.4 km from Jardines de Monforte, 1.1 km from Church of Saint Nicolás and less than 1 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Mythic Valencia all rooms include bed linen and towels.

The accommodation provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Staff speak Arabic, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk.

Popular points of interest near Mythic Valencia include Turia Gardens, González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and Serranos Towers. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Habitación céntrica de Lujo Gv 5
description:
Set in Valencia, less than 1 km from Norte Train Station and a 12-minute walk from Turia Gardens, Habitación céntrica de Lujo Gv 5 offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. The property is located 3.7 km from L'Oceanografic, 3.7 km from Puerto de Valencia and 5.2 km from Bioparc Valencia. The property is non-smoking and is situated less than 1 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts.

Towels and bed linen are offered in the homestay.

Popular points of interest near the homestay include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Jardines de Monforte and Church of Saint Nicolás. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from Habitación céntrica de Lujo Gv 5.

name: Loft independiente de Lujo.
description:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace, Loft independiente de Lujo. Is set in Valencia. Featuring a garden, the apartment is close to several noted attractions, around less than 1 km from Turia Gardens, a 11-minute walk from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and 1.4 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. The property is non-smoking and is situated less than 1 km from Norte Train Station.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV and a kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Jardines de Monforte, Church of Saint Nicolás and Plaza Ayuntamiento. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from Loft independiente de Lujo..

name: Apartamentos La Xerea
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 60m²
description:
Set in a former convent in Valencia’s old town, these loft apartments and studios feature flat-screen TVs and free internet access. Apartamentos La Xerea are 10 minutes’ walk from Valencia Cathedral.

Apartamentos La Xerea combines modern facilities with restored original features, including wooden beams. All accommodation has contemporary décor with wooden flooring.

Each air-conditioned studio and apartment has a spacious living room with a dining area. Kitchenettes come with an oven, washing machine and microwave.

Apartamentos La Xerea is a few minutes’ walk from the pretty Passeig de la Ciutadella Boulevard, which leads on to the Royal Gardens. The Palau de la Música Auditorium is just 500 metres from the apartments.

name: Cozy Private Room
description:
Boasting a shared lounge and views of city, Cozy Private Room is a recently renovated homestay situated in Valencia, 2.9 km from Church of Saint Nicolás. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can enjoy quiet street views.

Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a shared bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the homestay, units include bed linen and towels.

Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 3.8 km from the homestay, while Jardines de Monforte is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 12 km from Cozy Private Room.

name: One Shot Palacio Reina Victoria 04
description:
Located in the centre of Valencia, next to Plaza del Ayuntamiento, One Shot Palacio Reina Victoria 04 is an elegant hotel offering spacious, air-conditioned rooms. Free WiFi is available throughout.

Each room comes with a 48-inch flat-screen TV, heating, safe and minibar, as well as a private bathroom with a rain shower or bath tub, hairdryer and free toiletries. Most rooms offer street views.

Valencia Cathedral and the UNESCO World Heritage Llotja de Seda are within a 10-minute walk of One Shot Palacio Reina Victoria 04. City of Arts & Sciences is less than 3 km away.

Colon and Xativa metro stations are located 5 minutes' walk from the hotel, and both offer direct transport to Valencia Airport within 20 minutes.

name: Soho Boutique Turia
description:
Located in Valencia, within 500 metres of Turia Gardens and less than 1 km of González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, Soho Boutique Turia provides accommodation with a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.2 km from Jardines de Monforte.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Soho Boutique Turia each room has bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Norte Train Station and Church of Saint Nicolás. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from Soho Boutique Turia.

name: Hotel Valencia Center
description:
Hotel Valencia Center is 400 metres from Valencia’s City of Arts and Sciences, 3 km from the city centre. It offers a sauna, gym and outdoor pool, and free Wi-Fi.

The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Ayora Metro Station, which connects to the city centre and the airport. It takes 5 minutes by bus to the beach or city centre, and there is a bus stop opposite the hotel.

All air-conditioned/heated (according season) rooms have a satellite TV, safe and minibar

The hotel restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. There is a bar and room service is available.

There is a 24-hour front desk and you can hire a car at the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge.

name: El Coso
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 100m²
description:
This new hotel is set just off Las Arenas beach, occupying location in Valencia’s 21st-century expansion, beside the Veles e Vents building.

At the heart of Valencia’s new development, Hotel El Coso features facilities for you to enjoy that include a hot tub or hydromassage bath.

In addition, all guestrooms are equipped with free internet and plasma-screen TVs with over 40 channels.

Guests can enjoy the local speciality paella or the mediterranean dishes in the hotel’s 2 restaurants.

name: Hi Valencia Canovas
description:
Located just 100 metres from Paseo de la Alameda Boulevard,  Hi Valencia Canovas is less than 1 km from Valencia's old town. It offers simple, attractive accommodation with shared or private bathrooms.

All rooms at the  Hi Valencia Canovas offer bright, modern décor and each has heating, a fan and a TV.

The guest house offers breakfast for an extra cost at a café located 100 metres from the property. The property is within walking distance of a good selection of cafés, bars and restaurants. Valencia’s old town is less than 1 km away.

The Carmen district and Valencia Cathedral are less than 1 km from the property. Colón Metro Station is a 10-minute walk away and is 1 stop from Valencia Railway Station. Malvarrosa Beach can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro.

name: Travel Habitat Benimaclet Vista Hermosa Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
A sustainable property, Travel Habitat Benimaclet Vista Hermosa Suites is situated in Valencia near Jardines de Monforte, Turia Gardens and Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. During your time staying in this recently renovated apartment, dating back to 2022, you will have access to free WiFi. The apartment has family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property. A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 2.4 km from Travel Habitat Benimaclet Vista Hermosa Suites, while Church of Saint Nicolás is 3.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ilunion Aqua 4
description:
This design hotel is conveniently set in front of Valencia’s impressive City of Arts and Sciences, and the Oceanographic Park. Free WiFi is available throughout.

Stylish rooms at Ilunion Aqua 4 feature wooden floors and modern décor in warm colours, as well as air conditioning. They all include a large work desk, safe, minibar, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some rooms offer panoramic views over Valencia’s City of Arts and Sciences. The bathroom features marble finishes and comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A varied breakfast is served daily, and à-la-carte and set menus are available for lunch and dinner. There are also special products for celiac and food intolerant guests. Room service is available during limited hours.

The Aqua Multiespacio shopping centre features a wide range of shops, a spa and a fitness centre.

Ilunion Aqua 4 is 2 km from the centre of Valencia and 1 km from the harbour. Buses to the city centre stop 50 metres away. The Malvarrosa and Las Areas beaches are a few minutes' drive from the hotel and Manises Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away. Discounted rates are offered for parking at the Aqua Multiespacio shopping centre.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.

name: Bet Apartments - Viveros Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Situated in Valencia, a 15-minute walk from Facultat Metro Station and right next to Viveros Park, Bet Apartments - Viveros Apartments features a shared indoor pool and offers apartments with free WiFi.

Air-conditioned and heated, the apartments include a seating area with a flat-screen TV. Each also has a kitchen, equipped with a washing machine, hob, and microwave.

There is a private bathroom in each apartment and it includes a hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided.

Estacio del Nord Train Station is a 25-minute walk from the property. City of Arts and Sciences can be reached in 7 minutes by car, and a 25-minute tram ride takes you to Malvarrosa Beach.

name: Ilunion Valencia 3
description:
Ilunion Valencia 3 boasts an outdoor pool and free WiFi throughout. It is located 800 metres from the Congress Centre.

Featuring Nordic-style décor in light colors, the air-conditioned rooms at the Ilunion Valencia 3 have parquet floors. They come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and the bathroom includes a shower, free toiletries, and a hairdryer. Some of the rooms offer stunning views over the city.

The Ilunion Valencia 3 serves a daily breakfast and offers à- la-carte dishes, including a typical Valencian paella. A special menu for celiac and food intolerant guests is available. Guests can relax on the terrace by the swimming pool.

A shopping centre and a range of restaurants are available within a 10-minute walk of Ilunion Valencia 3. Beniferri Metro Station is 250 metres away, and there is a bus stop nearby connecting the hotel with Valencia City Centre in less than 10 minutes.

Private on-site parking is available for an extra cost.

Rental license HO03/2012/13

The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. At YOU & CO. Saler Beach Boutique each room has bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Guests at YOU & CO. Saler Beach Boutique will be able to enjoy activities in and around Valencia, like hiking.

L'Oceanografic is 9.4 km from the hotel, while Puerto de Valencia is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia, 19 km from YOU & CO. Saler Beach Boutique, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description:

This sustainable apartment is located less than 1 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and 1.8 km from Jardines de Monforte. The apartment has private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, Norte Train Station and Quart Towers. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from Valencia Central Loft.

name: Bet Apartments - Tramontana Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Located in Valencia’s Barrio del Carmen Neighbourhood, a 10-minute walk to Valencia Cathedral, Bet Apartments - Tramontana Apartments offers modern self-catering accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi.

These bright, air-conditioned apartments feature contemporary finishes and come with 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom. The living room includes a sofa bed, iPod dock, flat-screen TV and radio. The kitchenette is equipped with an oven, electric kettle, Nespresso coffee machine and kitchenware.

You will find many bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets.

Norte Train Station is 20 minutes’ walk from Bet Apartments - Tramontana Apartments and Malvarrosa Beach is 6 km away. Valencia Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Parking is available 5 minutes' walk from the property, subject to availability.

name: Lore Loft Valencia
description:
Situated in Valencia, 3 km from Malvarrosa Beach and 1.4 km from Puerto de Valencia, Lore Loft Valencia offers air conditioning. The property is around 3.1 km from Turia Gardens, 3.4 km from Jardines de Monforte and 1.9 km from L'Oceanografic. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Playa de las Arenas is 2.4 km away.

Located on the ground floor, this apartment has 1 bedroom, a well-equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a living room, and a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Norte Train Station is 3.9 km from the apartment, while González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 4.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from Lore Loft Valencia.

name: Hotel Turia
description:
Hotel Turia is next to Valencia Bus Station, and 350 metres from Turia Metro Station. Set across the Turia Park from the Botanical Gardens, it is a 20-minute walk from the cathedral.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Turia Hotel have a TV and most feature a private balcony. There is a safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

Nuevo Centro Shopping Centre and El Corte Inglés Department Store are opposite the hotel. Excellent public transport makes it easy to reach City of Arts and Sciences, airport and Convention Centre.

The Turia has a bar on site, as well as a tour desk and a 24-hour front desk.

Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. There is on-site parking at an extra cost.

The Hotel is being renovated please note that there might be noises during the day.

name: Pio XII Apartments Valencia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 40m²
description:
Offering stylish, modern apartments with balconies and free Wi-Fi, Pio XII Apartments Valencia is 2 minutes’ walk of Túria Gardens and Túria Metro station. It is close to shops, bars, restaurants and a shopping centre.

Each spacious, air-conditioned apartment at Pio XII Apartments Valencia has simple, bright décor. There is a seating area with a sofa bed and a flat-screen TV. Kitchen facilities include a fridge, microwave, oven and coffee maker. A baby pushchair/pram and high chair are available on request.

Breakfast is served in various nearby cafes within a 2-minute walk.

Valencia’s old town and cathedral, 2 km away, can be reached in approximately 15 minutes by bus or Metro. The famous City of the Arts and Sciences is 8 stops from Túria Metro Station.

name: Calatrava by Alma Suites
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 43m²
description:
Surrounded by views of the river, Calatrava by Alma Suites is a sustainable apartment in Valencia, offering guests an environmentally friendly accommodation close to Bioparc Valencia. With a garden, the 4-star apartment has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Guests can enjoy city views.

The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bath, shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchen features a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. A fridge and kettle are also provided.

Church of Saint Nicolás is 3 km from the apartment, while Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 4.5 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 6 km from Calatrava by Alma Suites.

name: Apartamentos Plaza Picasso
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 48m²
description:
The apartments are situated in the city of Valencia next to the Turia, the former river bed converted into lush gardens. They are also 500 metres from the Bioparc Zoo.

The modern apartments are all exterior-facing and well-equipped with all you need for a comfortable stay, conveniently located just 5 minutes from the metro and bus station.

Cleaning of the apartments will take place every 3 days and includes the change of bed linen and towels. Daily cleaning service is also available at an extra cost.

name: Cozy & quiet flat near Ruzafa
description:
Set in Valencia, 1.6 km from Norte Train Station and 3.4 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, Cozy & quiet flat near Ruzafa offers spacious air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. The property is located 3.6 km from Turia Gardens, 3.9 km from Jardines de Monforte and 4 km from L'Oceanografic. The property is non-smoking and is situated 3.4 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is featured.

Church of Saint Nicolás is 4.1 km from the apartment, while Puerto de Valencia is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from Cozy & quiet flat near Ruzafa.

name: NH Ciudad de Valencia
description:
Located in a quiet area of Valencia, NH Ciudad de Valencia is 15 minutes’ walk from the City of Arts and Sciences and the Port where the Americas Cup takes place.

The modern rooms at the Hotel Ciudad de Valencia feature parquet floors, free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms come with a work desk.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast. There is a variety of restaurants and bars within a 5-minute walk of the hotel.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours and live shows. There are also car and bicycle rental services available from the front desk.

Maritim-Serreria and Ayora Metro Stations are within 250 metres, offering access to the beach, the city centre and the airport.

name: Hotel Valencia Oceanic Affiliated by Meliá
description:
Overlooking Valencia’s City of Arts and Sciences, Hotel Valencia Oceanic Managed by Melia Hotels International offers a gym, an outdoor pool and a sun terrace. Each bright, air-conditioned room includes satellite TV and a laptop safe.

Hotel Valencia Oceanic Managed by Melia Hotels International's soundproofed rooms are simply decorated in warm tones. They all have a private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer.

The hotel offers a varied buffet breakfast, and Mediterranean dishes are served in the à la carte restaurant. Hotel Valencia Oceanic Managed by Melia Hotels International also has a lobby bar and a poolside snack bar.

El Corte Inglés Department Store can be found right next to the hotel, and the City of Arts and Sciences is a 5-minute walk away. The beach is a 10-minute bus ride away, and city’s historic centre is within 3 km.

name: Hotel Malcom and Barret
description:
Hotel Malcom and Barret is located in Valencia, 5 minutes' drive from the City of Arts and Sciences and Estació del Nord Station. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and a 40” flat-screen TV.

The rooms at Hotel Malcom and Barret come with a safe and a desk. The private bathroom has a shower, magnifying mirror, hairdryer and toiletries.

The hotel offers a restaurant with a buffet breakfast.

Hotel Malcom and Barret also has a 24-hour reception, 5 meeting rooms and luggage storage.

There are various restaurants, bars and nightclubs in the area. Valencia’s Old Town is 2 km away and can be reached in 30 minutes by foot, while Malvarrosa Beach is 5 km away.

Private on-site parking is available for an extra cost. You can drive to Valencia Airport in around 20 minutes.

name: Mosen Sorell Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Apartamentos Mosen Sorell is located in Valencia’s Old Town, just 500 metres from Plaza de la Virgen. It offers modern, air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV.

The Mosen Sorell apartments feature stylish décor. The kitchen includes a dishwasher, oven, microwave and coffee maker. Some apartments also have a private balcony overlooking Mosen Sorell Square or a terrace.

Valencia Cathedral and the lively Plaza de la Reina Square are around 650 metres from the apartments. The former market of La Lonja de la Seda, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is 450 metres away. The City of Arts and Sciences is 3 km away, and a regular bus service connects you with the rest of the city.

name: Parker The Urban Flats
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Parker The Urban Flats are located just outside Valencia’s old town. They are stylish apartments with modern décor, a flat-screen TV with international channels and free Wi-Fi.

The Parker The Urban Flats open-plan apartments feature white, minimalist design and contemporary furniture. The kitchenette comes with a ceramic hob and microwave.

Staff at the property’s reception can help booking tickets for guided tours and live shows. The cleaning service is every 3 days.

The property is located just 50 metres from the Parque de la Cultura, where you will find the city’s library. You can easily explore the rest of the city using the metro network – the nearest stop to the property is Ángel Guimera, just a 50-metre walk away.

name: L&H Gran Vía Valencia
description:
Featuring a restaurant, bar and views of city, L&H Gran Vía Valencia is located in Valencia, less than 1 km from Church of Saint Nicolás. Featuring a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

All units in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Every room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at L&H Gran Vía Valencia have a balcony. At the accommodation every room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish and French, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed.

Popular points of interest near L&H Gran Vía Valencia include Norte Train Station, Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

name: Arena Zone Hotel
description:
Arena Zone Hotel is an urban hotel located in Valencia, 1.2 km from the City of Arts and Sciences. It offers accommodation with private parking and a terrace.

This 3-star hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom. There is a reception from 10AM to 10PM and concierge and guest service 23Hs/day.

All rooms include a desk and flat screen TV, chromecast and 600 megabyte internet. Rooms include wardrobe.

The Arena Zone Hotel offers a rich breakfast with a wide variety, provided by the restaurant located at our facilities, with direct access from our reception.

Oceanogràfic is 1.4 km from the accommodation, while Turia Gardens is 2.5 km away. We are also a few meters from the L10 and the El Saler shopping center. Our location is unbeatable. And that's not all, just over 10 kilometers away is El Saler and l'Arbre del Gos beaches, and about 14 kilometers away from La Devesa beach.

The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from Arena Zone Hotel. Airport shuttle service is provided at an additional cost.

Couples love the location — Gave it an 8.3 for two-person trips.

Nearby beaches: El Saler beach, l'Arbre del Gos beach and La Devesa beach

name: Flatsforyou Carmen
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Featuring private sun terrace and free Wi-Fi, Bed and Bike Apartement is a complex of design apartments with decorations made out of bikes. It is located next to Valencia Cathedral.

Each air-conditioned apartment with a balcony has a double bedroom and a sofa bed in the living room. It features a flat-screen TV and washing machine. An oven, toaster, microwave and coffee machine are provided in the kitchen.

The Turia Gardens are just 300 metres away and City of Arts and Sciences is 30 minutes’ walk from the property.

Valencia Railway Station is located within 1 km of the property and Valencia Airport can be reached in 10 minutes by car. Airport shuttle can be organized upon request. Private parking is available upon request near the property.

name: Ilunion Aqua 3
description:
The design-driven Ilunion Aqua 3 is located just 300 metres from Valencia’s City of Art and Sciences and the Oceanographic Park. It offers a modern rooms, a 24-hour reception, and free WiFi.

The hotel is located above the Aqua Multiespacio shopping centre, which features a multi-screen cinema, a wide range of clothing shops a spa and a fitness centre.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Ilunion Aqua 3 feature wooden floors and modern décor in warm colours. They all include a work desk, safe and flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The bathroom features marble finishes and comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The hotel has a bright and modern restaurant, where breakfast is served each morning. The restaurant also offers à-la-carte and set menus for lunch and dinner, and it features special menus for guests with allergies.

There is a bus stop just 50 metres from the hotel, from which there is a regular service to the city centre and the beach. The Malvarrosa and Las Arenas beaches are just a few minutes drive from the hotel, and Manises Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away. Discounted rates are offered for parking at the Aqua Multiespacio shopping centre.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

Late check-out until 12:00 is offered to all guests free of charge.

name: Blanq Carmen Hotel
description:
Set in a historic building that still preserves its original façade, just 25 metres from the Serranos Towers, Blanq Carmen Hotel is located in Valencia’s old town. Free WiFi is available.

All air-conditioned rooms at this hotel feature satellite TV and a seating area. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The hotel features a seasonal rooftop terrace with a plunge pool.

Blanq Carmen Hotel is just a 2-minute walk from the cathedral and Miguelete belfry, 5 minutes from the central market, silk market and one of the most important financial and commercial areas.

name: Maison Sereine
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Located in Valencia, 3.1 km from Church of Saint Nicolás and 4 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Maison Sereine provides air-conditioned accommodation with a patio and free WiFi. This recently renovated apartment is located 4 km from Jardines de Monforte and 4.1 km from Turia Gardens. The property is non-smoking and is set 4.3 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts.

The spacious apartment comes with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with inner courtyard views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Sightseeing tours are available near the property.

Bioparc Valencia is 4.5 km from the apartment, while Norte Train Station is 5.4 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from Maison Sereine.

name: Las Artes Hlius Luxury Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 52m²
description:
Set in Valencia, 2.9 km from Norte Train Station and 3.3 km from Turia Gardens, Las Artes Hlius Luxury Apartments offers air conditioning. The property is located 3.8 km from Puerto de Valencia, 4 km from Jardines de Monforte and 4.1 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and L'Oceanografic is 1.7 km away.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 4.2 km from the apartment, while Church of Saint Nicolás is 5.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 10 km from Las Artes Hlius Luxury Apartments.

name: Hotel Conqueridor
description:
The Hotel Conqueridor consists of two annex buildings that are the Hotel Conqueridor and the Boutique Hotel Petit Conqueridor, in whose building our Economic Rooms have been located.

The modern Hotel Conqueridor is located in central Valencia, just 250 metres from Norte Railway Station. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms have free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The hotel is just 300 metres from Valencia’s main shopping area, and 300 metres from Plaza Espanya Metro Station. Buses from Plaza Espanya also offer easy access to the beach.

The Conqueridor Hotel’s restaurant is located on the ground floor and offers a varied breakfast. In the evenings it offers modern versions of classic Spanish dishes.

Please note that from March 2022 to December 2024 we are carrying out restoration work at the hotel. During the renovation, there will be noises and some services as Gym and Sauna will remain close. Sorry for the inconvenience.

name: Best Valencia Beach Flat Historic Area next to the Beach
description:
Set in Valencia, 800 metres from Playa de las Arenas, Best Valencia Beach Flat Historic Area next to the Beach offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. This sustainable apartment is located less than 1 km from Malvarrosa Beach and 1.9 km from Patacona Beach. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some units feature a terrace or a patio. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, the units include bed linen and towels.

A car rental service is available at Best Valencia Beach Flat Historic Area next to the Beach.

Puerto de Valencia is 1.5 km from the accommodation, while Turia Gardens is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from Best Valencia Beach Flat Historic Area next to the Beach.

name: Lindala
description:
Located in Valencia, 1.4 km from Puerto de Valencia, Lindala provides air-conditioned rooms and a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has a garden and features a terrace.

At the hotel, rooms have a wardrobe. At Lindala every room has a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Malvarrosa beach is 900 meters from the hotel, and Oceanografic is just 2.3 km away.
City of Arts & Sciences is 3.1 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 16 km from Lindala.

name: Malvarrosa apartamentos
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 90m²
description:
Situated in Valencia, 400 metres from Malvarrosa Beach and 800 metres from Patacona Beach, Malvarrosa apartamentos offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is located 3.3 km from Puerto de Valencia and features a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Playa de las Arenas.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views has 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Jardines de Monforte is 5.8 km from the apartment, while L'Oceanografic is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia, 15 km from Malvarrosa apartamentos, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Slow Home Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
A recently renovated property, Slow Home Apartments is situated in Valencia near Playa de las Arenas, Malvarrosa Beach and Patacona Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and full-day security, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment has family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, a walk-in shower and free toiletries. A dishwasher, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

For guests with children, the apartment features a baby safety gate.

Puerto de Valencia is 1.6 km from Slow Home Apartments, while Turia Gardens is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Flatsforyou Marina Playa
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Offering free WiFi throughout, Flatsforyou Bed and Bike Marina is situated in Valencia. Puerto de Valencia is 500 metres from the property.

The accommodation has a seating and dining area. All units include a kitchen fitted with an oven and microwave. A toaster, a refrigerator and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Every unit is equipped with a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured.

Oceanografic is 1.2 km from Flatsforyou Bed and Bike Marina, while City of Arts & Sciences is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 12 km from Flatsforyou Bed and Bike Marina.

name: Valencia Luxury - Boutique Redonda
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 55m²
description:
Valencia Luxury - Boutique Redonda provides accommodation within 100 metres of the centre of Valencia, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. It is located less than 1 km from Norte Train Station and offers a lift. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

All units are equipped with a toaster, fridge, a coffee machine, a stovetop and kettle. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, the units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms include a terrace. At the apartment complex, all units have bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available near the property.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Church of Saint Nicolás, Turia Gardens and González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from Valencia Luxury - Boutique Redonda.

name: Bet Apartments - Reig
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Located in Valencia, less than 1 km from Jardines de Monforte, Bet Apartments - Reig provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and express check-in and check-out. This sustainable aparthotel is located 1.3 km from Turia Gardens and 2.9 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The aparthotel features family rooms.

Each unit is equipped with a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a seating area, a TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and kitchenware are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units include bed linen.

Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 1.9 km from the aparthotel, while Norte Train Station is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from Bet Apartments - Reig.

name: B&B HOTEL Valencia Ciudad de las Ciencias
description:
Located around 1.5 km from Valencia’s impressive City of Arts and Sciences, this hotel offers modern rooms and free WiFi. There is a 24-hour reception.

The modern rooms have a flat-screen TV. Central heating and air conditioning are available depending on the season. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Rooms are cleaned every day.

A varied buffet breakfast is served daily , there is also a lobby bar.

The centre of Valencia is 3 km from B&B HOTEL Valencia Ciudad de las Ciencias and Las Arenas Beach is 5 km away. The Feria Valencia is 20 minutes' drive away. It is 800 metres from La Fe Hospital.

name: Goerlich by Alma Suites
description_short: Private suite
description:
Goerlich by Alma Suites offers accommodation within 300 metres of the centre of Valencia, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. This sustainable apartment is located less than 1 km from Norte Train Station and a 5-minute walk from Church of Saint Nicolás. The apartment has family rooms.

All units come with a fridge, stovetop, a coffee machine, a kitchenware and kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, all units at the apartment complex have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also offer a seating area. At the apartment complex, the units include bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Turia Gardens, González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. The nearest airport is Valencia, 8 km from Goerlich by Alma Suites, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Senator Parque Central Hotel
description:
Senator Parque Central Hotel is situated in central Valencia, 15 minutes’ walk from Xativa Station and the Old Town. This modern hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a fitness centre and sauna.

Rooms at the Senator Parque Central are air conditioned and soundproofed, and feature a safe. A hairdryer and amenities are included in the private bathrooms. 2 free bottles of mineral water are provided upon arrival.

The Senator has an air-conditioned dining room, where a daily buffet breakfast is served. There is also a bar. The hotel has a 24-hour reception desk.

Las Arenas Beach and Valencia Port are 5 km from the hotel, and regular public bus services stop outside the hotel. There are also many shops and bars in the surrounding streets. The nearest airport is Valencia airport, 10.5 km from the property.

name: Malvarrosa Apartamento
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 90m²
description:
Located in Valencia, 500 metres from Patacona Beach and 700 metres from Malvarrosa Beach, Malvarrosa Apartamento offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is situated 3.6 km from Puerto de Valencia and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from Playa de las Arenas.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views.

Jardines de Monforte is 5.4 km from the apartment, while Turia Gardens is 5.7 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia, 14 km from Malvarrosa Apartamento, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Loft independiente de Lujo.
description:
Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace, Loft independiente de Lujo. Is set in Valencia. Featuring a garden, the apartment is close to several noted attractions, around less than 1 km from Turia Gardens, a 11-minute walk from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and 1.4 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. The property is non-smoking and is situated less than 1 km from Norte Train Station.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV and a kitchen with a dishwasher and oven. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Jardines de Monforte, Church of Saint Nicolás and Plaza Ayuntamiento. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from Loft independiente de Lujo..

name: Hostal Blayet
description:
Hostal Blayet is a beachfront guest house in Valencia, offering guests a sustainable accommodation with scenic sea views. This guest house provides free private parking and full-day security. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a children's playground.

All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a bath and free toiletries, units at the guest house also offer free WiFi, while some rooms are equipped with a terrace. At the guest house, each unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Dining options are available close to the guest house.

Guests at Hostal Blayet will be able to enjoy activities in and around Valencia, like snorkelling, cycling and hiking. An indoor play area is also available at the accommodation, while guests can also relax in the garden.

Playa La Devesa is 200 metres from Hostal Blayet, while Recati Beach is 400 metres away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 28 km from the guest house.

name: SH Valencia Palace
description:
Located in front of the Palau de la Música in Valencia, this elegant hotel features a rooftop swimming pool and sun terrace. It offers spacious rooms with a classic design and free Wi-Fi.

SH Valencia is 10 minutes’ drive from the impressive City of Arts and Sciences. Malvarrosa Beach is just 3 km away while the airport is 25 km away.

There is also a snack bar and a lobby bar. A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas.

name: Eurostars Acteón
description:
Eurostars Acteón is 15 minutes’ walk from Valencia’s City of Arts and Sciences. Free WiFi is available at the hotel.

The spacious, soundproofed rooms feature large windows. The air-conditioned rooms also have a satellite TV, a work desk and a safe. Private bathroom comes with a bath, a hairdryer and a hot towel rail.

The restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and there is a café-bar. It offers a daily breakfast buffet, and room service is available. Guests receive a welcome drink.

Eurostars Acteón has a 24-hour front desk where car or bicycle rental service can be assisted. The on-site parking is available at an additional charge.

Buses to Valencia city centre, 5 minutes' drive away, stop in front of the hotel, and Ayora Metro Station is 650 metres away. Playa de La Malvarrosa Beach and the Juan Carlos I Marina are about 3 minutes’ drive away. Aqua and El Saler Shopping Centres are 15 minutes' walk away.

name: NH Valencia Las Ciencias
description:
This hotel has an ideal setting by Valencia’s City of Arts and Sciences and offers contemporary rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs. Buses leave from outside the hotel to the city centre.

The functional rooms at NH Valencia Las Ciencias feature air conditioning and are decorated in pastel colours. The modern bathroom comes with a hairdryer and NH amenities.

A continental and buffet breakfast is available at NH Valencia Las Ciencias, while the café-bar serves drinks and light refreshments.

NH Valencia Las Ciencias is conveniently set just 15 minutes’ walk from Las Arenas Beach. There is a large shopping centre and many cafés nearby.

name: Reinapart Valencia Beach
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
A recently renovated property, Reinapart Valencia Beach is located in Valencia near Playa de las Arenas, Malvarrosa Beach and Puerto de Valencia. Among the facilities at this property are a lift and private check-in and check-out, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment also offers facilities for disabled guests.

At the apartment complex, all units come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A dishwasher, an oven and microwave are also provided, as well as a coffee machine. At the apartment complex, every unit has bed linen and towels.

There is a snack bar on-site.

Patacona Beach is 2.1 km from the apartment, while L'Oceanografic is 4.1 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 14 km from Reinapart Valencia Beach.

name: NH Valencia Las Artes
description:
This design hotel is located just 5 minutes’ walk from Valencia’s City of Arts and Sciences. It offers a gym, sauna, indoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with a plasma TV, free Wi-Fi and pillow menu.

NH Valencia Las Artes is opposite El Saler Shopping Centre and 5 km from Malvarrosa Beach. There are good bus connections with the city centre, and easy access to the A-7 Motorway.

The hotel’s stylish restaurant serves traditional Valencian food with a modern twist. There is a special children’s menu.

NH Las Artes has other facilities for children including a games room. The 24-hour reception also offers currency exchange and bicycle rental.

name: Catalonia Excelsior
description:
Catalonia Excelsior is located in Valencia’s Old Town, just a few metres from Plaza del ayuntamiento Square. This elegant hotel features a café, free Wi-Fi access, rooms with satellite TVs.

The Excelsior’s rooms are bright and air conditioned. Each has air conditioning, a small fridge and a well-equipped bathroom.

Guests can enjoy a daily, buffet breakfast in the Catalonia’s café. There is a range of cafés, bars and restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.

Valencia Cathedral is a 5-minute walk from the Excelsior whilst the Plaza de Toros Bullring is less than one kilometre away. The nearest Metro Station, Colón can be reached in 10 minutes, by foot.

name: Apartamentos Navío
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 25m²
description:
Located in Valencia, 1.6 km from Church of Saint Nicolás and 1.8 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Apartamentos Navío offers free WiFi and air conditioning. The property is situated 3 km from Turia Gardens, 3.2 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and 3.7 km from Bioparc Valencia. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.9 km from Jardines de Monforte.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

Norte Train Station is 4.2 km from the apartment, while Puerto de Valencia is 6.5 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from Apartamentos Navío.

name: Carrer de l'Arquitecte Alfaro 27 bajo derecha
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Located in Valencia, 1.6 km from Playa de las Arenas and 2.2 km from Malvarrosa Beach, Carrer de l'Arquitecte Alfaro 27 bajo derecha provides air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. The property is set 3.5 km from L'Oceanografic, 4.1 km from Turia Gardens and 4.4 km from Jardines de Monforte. The property is non-smoking and is situated 700 metres from Puerto de Valencia.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Norte Train Station is 4.9 km from the apartment, while González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 5.4 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from Carrer de l'Arquitecte Alfaro 27 bajo derecha.

name: Hotel Miramar Valencia
description:
This small, contemporary-styled hotel overlooks the Mediterranean Sea from its setting at the Playa de Las Arenas Beach, near the Marina Real Juan Carlos I in Valencia city. Free WiFi is available.

Located on the beach, the hotel's Lounge-Restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine and cocktails. The bar is open all day long.

Modern rooms include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Valencia city centre can be reached in around 20 minutes' drive or 30 minutes by public transport.

name: Valencia Luxury - Sea Port I
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 40m²
description:
Set in Valencia, within 2.6 km of Playa de las Arenas and 1.5 km of Puerto de Valencia, Valencia Luxury - Sea Port I offers accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning and a terrace. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a fully equipped kitchenette. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.4 km from Turia Gardens.

With 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom, this sustainable apartment is fitted with a flat-screen TV.

Jardines de Monforte is 2.7 km from the apartment, while L'Oceanografic is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia, 12 km from Valencia Luxury - Sea Port I, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Eurostars Gran Valencia
description:
This modern hotel, next to Valencia’s Congress Centre, offers views over the city centre and free Wi-Fi. The Eurostars has a gym, sauna and rooftop pool.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Gran Valencia feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a safe and a minibar.

The hotel has a bar, and the restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine, such as fresh seafood. Room service is also available. A packed breakfast is served in the room.

The Eurostars Gran Valencia offers a laundy and dry cleaning service. Valencia's Old Town is 3 km away. There are Metro, train and bus stops nearby.

name: Piso en Malvarrosa
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Set in Valencia, just 500 metres from Malvarrosa Beach, Piso en Malvarrosa offers beachfront accommodation with free WiFi. The air-conditioned accommodation is 800 metres from Patacona Beach. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.1 km from Playa de las Arenas.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The property offers city views.

Sightseeing tours are available close by.

Puerto de Valencia is 2.8 km from the apartment, while Jardines de Monforte is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia, 14 km from Piso en Malvarrosa, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Travel Habitat La Marina Real
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 45m²
description:
Ideally situated in the Poblats Maritims district of Valencia, Travel Habitat La Marina Real is situated 2.5 km from Malvarrosa Beach, 500 metres from Puerto de Valencia and 3.3 km from L'Oceanografic. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Playa de las Arenas is 1.4 km away.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within a reachable distance of the property. A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Turia Gardens is 3.8 km from Travel Habitat La Marina Real, while Jardines de Monforte is 4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Primus Valencia
description:
This ultra-modern hotel is just 600 metres from Valencia’s impressive City of Arts and Sciences. It has a spa, gym, an all-year round outdoor swimming pool and its elegant rooms feature plasma satellite TV and free WiFi.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Valencia Primus have attractive wooden flooring and bright, modern décor. Each one is soundproofed and has a work desk and laptop safe.

For a surcharge, guests have access to the hotel’s extensive spa, which features a dynamic swimming pool, cold pool, hot tub, sauna and hammam. A range of massage and beauty treatments are available for a surcharge. There is also a fitness centre.

The hotel’s stylish restaurant serves traditional Mediterranean food with a modern twist. It has an outdoor terrace, and there is also a café-bar overlooking the charming decked garden.

Aqua Multiespacio Shopping Centre is just opposite the Primus Valencia. There is a bus stop 75 metres away, connecting you with the city centre and beaches.

name: Hotel Dimar
description:
Situated in Valencia’s Cánovas Square, this modern design hotel offers a gym and free Wi-Fi. Each stylish room at Hotel Dimar has tea and coffee making facilities and flat-screen TV.

The Hotel Dimar’s air-conditioned rooms have elegant décor and wooden flooring. They all offer a minibar and a private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer.

A continental buffet breakfast is served in the Hotel Dimar’s restaurant, while sandwiches and pastries are available in the bar. There is also a range of restaurants and bars in the surrounding streets.

Set next to the Turia Gardens, Hotel Dimar is within a 15-minute walk of Valencia Cathedral. Colon Metro Station is 600 metres away, while the famous City of Arts and Sciences is just 1.5 km from the hotel.

name: Barracart Apartments
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
Offering free WiFi, Apartamentos Barracart is situated in Valencia, 800 metres from Puerto de Valencia. It is 12 minutes' walk from Platja Del Cabanyal Beach. City of Arts & Sciences is 2.2 km away.

The accommodation is equipped with a flat-screen TV. All units have a fully-equipped kitchenette. A microwave and coffee machine are also offered. Every unit comes with a private bathroom with a shower. Towels are provided.

Oceanografic is 2.2 km from Apartamentos Barracart, while Barrio del Carmen is 4.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from Apartamentos Barracart.

name: Bird House
description:
Set 1.2 km from Turia Gardens, Bird House offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace. This sustainable bed and breakfast is located 2.3 km from Puerto de Valencia and 1.8 km from Jardines de Monforte. The bed and breakfast has family rooms.

All units comprise a seating area with a sofa, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen with various cooking facilities, including an oven, a microwave, a toaster and a fridge. Units come with a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while some rooms also feature a balcony. At the bed and breakfast, all units have bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach of the property. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.

Norte Train Station is 3.1 km from the bed and breakfast, while L'Oceanografic is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 12 km from Bird House.

name: YOU & CO. Quart Boutique
description:
Situated in Valencia and with Church of Saint Nicolás reachable within less than 1 km, YOU & CO. Quart Boutique features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At YOU & CO. Quart Boutique the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Speaking English, Spanish and Italian at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Norte Train Station, Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 7 km from YOU & CO. Quart Boutique.

name: Palau Apartments Valencia
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 28m²
description:
Less than 1 km from Turia Gardens, Palau Apartments Valencia is a recently renovated property located in Valencia and provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. This sustainable aparthotel is located 1.7 km from Jardines de Monforte and 2.1 km from Norte Train Station. The aparthotel features family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the aparthotel, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the area. A bicycle rental service is available at the aparthotel.

González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 1.8 km from Palau Apartments Valencia, while Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: WeRentVLC - Espectacular Loft Duplex 1 hab
description:
Set in Valencia, 3.5 km from Church of Saint Nicolás and 3.7 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, WeRentVLC - Espectacular Loft Duplex 1 hab offers air conditioning. The property is situated 3.8 km from Turia Gardens, 4.5 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and 5.4 km from Norte Train Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 3.7 km from Jardines de Monforte.

With free WiFi, this 1-bedroom apartment offers a flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and fridge. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Bioparc Valencia is 5.6 km from the apartment, while L'Oceanografic is 7.4 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from WeRentVLC - Espectacular Loft Duplex 1 hab.

name: Sercotel Valencia Alameda 41
description:
Hotel Valencia Alameda 41 is set in Valencia, 200 mts from City of Arts & Sciences. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant for the breakfast service. The rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The hotel is located on the first floor.

Rooms have a private bathroom with a shower and include a work desk and microwave.

Breakfast is available each morning and includes à la carte and Full English or Irish options.

A business center is available on site.

Puerto de Valencia is 1.5 km from Hotel Valencia Alameda. Valencia Airport is 11.1 km from the property.

name: Valencia Canyamelar Beach Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Situated 800 metres from Playa de las Arenas, Valencia Canyamelar Beach Apartments offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The apartment provides guests with a terrace, city views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit has bed linen and towels.

Malvarrosa Beach is 1.4 km from the apartment, while Patacona Beach is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 14 km from Valencia Canyamelar Beach Apartments.

name: Travel Habitat Alameda Suites.
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 75m²
description:
Set in Valencia within 1.3 km of Turia Gardens and 2 km of Jardines de Monforte, Travel Habitat Alameda Suites. Offers accommodation with free WiFi, seating area and a kitchen. This recently renovated apartment is located 2.6 km from Norte Train Station and 1.9 km from L'Oceanografic. The apartment features family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also featured, as well as a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit comes with bed linen and towels.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Puerto de Valencia is 3 km from Travel Habitat Alameda Suites., while González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia, 11 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: PRECIOSO APARTAMENTO EN EL BARRIO DE RUZAFA
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 83m²
description:
Set in Valencia, 1.1 km from Norte Train Station and 2.9 km from Turia Gardens, PRECIOSO APARTAMENTO EN EL BARRIO DE RUZAFA offers free WiFi and air conditioning. It is situated 3.1 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and offers a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.8 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts.

The spacious apartment with a balcony and city views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.
