Jardines de Monforte is 3.6 km from the apartment, while Church of Saint Nicolás is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from PRECIOSO APARTAMENTO EN EL BARRIO DE RUZAFA.

name: Original Domino House
description:
Offering a shared lounge and quiet street view, Original Domino House is situated in Valencia, 2 km from Jardines de Monforte and 2.4 km from Norte Train Station. The property has city and inner courtyard views, and is 1.4 km from Turia Gardens. The accommodation features a lift, luggage storage space and organising tours for guests.

All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, units at the guest house also feature free WiFi, while some rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the guest house, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the guest house.

Puerto de Valencia is 2.7 km from Original Domino House, while González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 2.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Neobeds - NEW ! Amazing charming Cosy 1BR Apt Valencia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 31m²
description:
In the La Saidia district of Valencia, close to Jardines de Monforte, Neobeds - NEW! Amazing charming Cosy 1BR Apt Valencia has free WiFi and a washing machine. This recently renovated apartment is located 1 km from Church of Saint Nicolás and less than 1 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. Guests can access the apartment via private entrance.

All units in the apartment complex are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a shower. A dishwasher, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. At the apartment complex, units come with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop on-site.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Turia Gardens, González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and Serranos Towers. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from Neobeds - NEW! Amazing charming Cosy 1BR Apt Valencia.

name: Apartamentos Río Turia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 27m²
description:
Apartamentos Río Turia features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Valencia, 2 km from Church of Saint Nicolás, 1.9 km from Bioparc Valencia and 3.4 km from Norte Train Station. Among the facilities at this property are private check-in and check-out and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment has private entrance.

The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchen has a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. A toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 3.9 km from the apartment, while Jardines de Monforte is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 6 km from Apartamentos Río Turia.

name: Zerka Sendra
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
In the centre of Valencia, located within a short distance of Church of Saint Nicolás and Norte Train Station, Zerka Sendra offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a fridge and kettle. It is situated 1.8 km from Jardines de Monforte and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 700 metres from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and microwave, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Turia Gardens, González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and Valencia Silk Exchange. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from Zerka Sendra.

name: FLORIT FLATS - Cabanyal 3 Bedroom WIFI AC Terrace Beach Penthouse
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 95m²
description:
Set in Valencia, 1.4 km from Playa de las Arenas and 2.1 km from Malvarrosa Beach, FLORIT FLATS - Cabanyal 3 Bedroom WIFI AC Terrace Beach Penthouse offers air conditioning. Among the facilities at this property are private check-in and check-out and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and quiet street views features 3 bedrooms, a living room, a TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

A car rental service is available at the apartment.

Patacona Beach is 3 km from FLORIT FLATS - Cabanyal 3 Bedroom WIFI AC Terrace Beach Penthouse, while Puerto de Valencia is 800 metres away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Modern Penthouse with Private Terrace
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 120m²
description:
Set in Valencia, 1.8 km from Norte Train Station and 3.7 km from Church of Saint Nicolás, Modern Penthouse with Private Terrace offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. It is situated 4.3 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is located 4.2 km from Turia Gardens.

The spacious apartment features 3 bedrooms, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 4.4 km from the apartment, while Bioparc Valencia is 4.5 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from Modern Penthouse with Private Terrace.

name: Rest Valencia
description:
Situated within 2.8 km of Jardines de Monforte and 2.9 km of Turia Gardens in Valencia, Rest Valencia features accommodation with seating area. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.3 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Church of Saint Nicolás is less than 1 km away.

At the aparthotel, every unit comes with a desk. Some units also have a well-fitted kitchenette equipped with a microwave, a fridge, and a stovetop. All units have bed linen.

Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, Norte Train Station and Valencia Botanical Gardens. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from Rest Valencia.

name: dama ibérica III
description:
Dama ibérica III is located in the Benicalap district of Valencia, 3.6 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, 3.7 km from Jardines de Monforte and 3.7 km from Turia Gardens. The apartment, set in a building dating from 1965, is 4 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and 4.7 km from Bioparc Valencia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Church of Saint Nicolás is 2.7 km away.

The recently renovated apartment is located on the ground floor and is equipped with 1 bedroom, a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a microwave and a fridge. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Norte Train Station is 5 km from the apartment, while Puerto de Valencia is 7.2 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from dama ibérica III.

name: Blanq Marina Suites
description:
Ideally located in the Camins al Grau district of Valencia, Blanq Marina Suites is located less than 1 km from Puerto de Valencia, 3.1 km from L'Oceanografic and 3.7 km from Turia Gardens. It is set 2.4 km from Malvarrosa Beach and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Playa de las Arenas is 1.8 km away.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a microwave, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. There is also a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen equipped with a stovetop and kitchenware. At the aparthotel, units come with bed linen and towels.

Jardines de Monforte is 3.9 km from the aparthotel, while Norte Train Station is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia, 13 km from Blanq Marina Suites, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Flatsforyou Port
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 45m²
description:
Set 10 minutes’ walk from the Port of Valencia, Flatsforyou Port offers air-conditioned apartments with free WiFi. Popular Oceanografic and City of Arts and Sciences of Valencia is 2 km away.

Each apartment features a living-dining room with a sofa bed, a flat-screen TV, and a DVD player. The modern kitchenette is equipped with a microwave, fridge, and kitchenware; while the bathroom has a hairdryer and bath or shower.

Several supermarkets, shops, and restaurants are within 5 minutes' walk.

You can reach the Old Town of Valencia in 15 minutes by public transports; and Valencia Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: Ramirez Flats Valencia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 30m²
description:
Offering city views, Ramirez Flats Valencia is set in the El Pla del Real district of Valencia, less than 1 km from Turia Gardens and a 17-minute walk from Jardines de Monforte. Private parking is available on site at this sustainable property. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a lift and free WiFi.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered in the kitchenette, as well as a kettle. At the aparthotel, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach. A bicycle rental service is available at the aparthotel.

Popular points of interest near Ramirez Flats Valencia include Norte Train Station, González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Cosmo Hotel Boutique
description:
Located in Valencia and with Norte Train Station reachable within 700 metres, Cosmo Hotel Boutique provides concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The property is 200 metres from the city centre and 500 metres from Church of Saint Nicolás.

At the hotel, each room has a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room has a safety deposit box, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

With staff speaking English, Spanish and Italian, around the clock guidance is available at the reception.

Popular points of interest near Cosmo Hotel Boutique include Turia Gardens, González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. The nearest airport is Valencia, 8 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: MD Julio Antonio Apartment Center
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Situated in Valencia, 1.4 km from Church of Saint Nicolás and 400 metres from Norte Train Station, MD Julio Antonio Apartment Center features air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. This sustainable apartment is located 1.9 km from Turia Gardens and 1.1 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The property is soundproof and is set 1.4 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados.

The spacious apartment has 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with city views. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property.

Jardines de Monforte is 4 km from the apartment, while Bioparc Valencia is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from MD Julio Antonio Apartment Center.

name: Apartamentos La Xerea
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 60m²
description:
Set in a former convent in Valencia’s old town, these loft apartments and studios feature flat-screen TVs and free internet access. Apartamentos La Xerea are 10 minutes’ walk from Valencia Cathedral.

Apartamentos La Xerea combines modern facilities with restored original features, including wooden beams. All accommodation has contemporary décor with wooden flooring.

Each air-conditioned studio and apartment has a spacious living room with a dining area. Kitchenettes come with an oven, washing machine and microwave.

Apartamentos La Xerea is a few minutes’ walk from the pretty Passeig de la Ciutadella Boulevard, which leads on to the Royal Gardens. The Palau de la Música Auditorium is just 500 metres from the apartments.

name: Vincci Palace
description:
Vincci Palace is located in central Valencia, 5 minutes’ walk from the Cathedral. It is an attractive design hotel offering elegant rooms with satellite TV and free internet access.

The Hotel Vincci Palace serves a buffet breakfast, which includes gluten-free products. There is a stylish on-site café selling refreshments and snacks, and a wide variety of restaurants can be found within a 5-minute walk of the hotel.

Staff at the 24-hour front desk can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. Meeting and conference rooms are also available at the Vincci Palace.

The hotel has excellent transport links, with 2 bus stops outside the hotel and Colón Metro Station located just 5 minutes’ walk away. From here there is a direct service to Valencia Airport.

name: Petit Palace Ruzafa
description:
Set in the heart of Valencia, this boutique hotel boasts an impressive 19th-century façade, stylish accommodation and a range of modern facilities.

Surrounded by the city centre’s shops, bars and restaurants, the Petit Palace Ruzafa is ideal for a stay in this lively Mediterranean city. The historic surroundings contrast with contemporary services such as free WiFi internet access.

The hotel is located close to the Train Station and just a short walk from the Turia Park. This green area lies in what was once a river bed and runs right through the middle of the city centre. Many of the historic bridges crossing the river are still in place.

name: NON STRESS First Level
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 91m²
description:
Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, NON STRESS First Level is located in Valencia. This beachfront property offers access to a terrace, tennis at the tennis court, free private parking and free WiFi. The apartment also offers facilities for disabled guests.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a bidet. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at the apartment. Guests can also relax in the garden.

Popular points of interest near NON STRESS First Level include Patacona Beach, Malvarrosa Beach and Playa de las Arenas. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Moontels Mercado de Ruzafa
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 19m²
description:
A recently renovated property, Moontels Mercado de Ruzafa is located in Valencia near Norte Train Station, Turia Gardens and González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. This sustainable aparthotel is located 1.8 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and 2.7 km from Jardines de Monforte. The aparthotel features facilities for disabled guests.

The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a desk, a coffee machine, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while selected rooms have a terrace. At the aparthotel, all units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

If you would rather not eat out, you can make use of the kitchen facilities, which include a fridge, kettle and a stovetop.

Church of Saint Nicolás is 1.9 km from the aparthotel, while L'Oceanografic is 3.8 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia, 8 km from Moontels Mercado de Ruzafa, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Apartamentos Wallace
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Featuring free WiFi and air conditioning, Apartamentos Wallace is set in Valencia, 700 metres from Barrio del Carmen. City of Arts & Sciences is 2.4 km away.

All units feature a seating area. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a microwave and fridge. Every unit is equipped with a private bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available. A cleaning service is available for a surcharge.

Bioparc Valencia is 3.1 km from Apartamentos Wallace. Valencia Airport is 9 km from the property.

name: Travel Habitat Benimaclet Vista Hermosa Suites
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 30m²
description:
A sustainable property, Travel Habitat Benimaclet Vista Hermosa Suites is situated in Valencia near Jardines de Monforte, Turia Gardens and Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. During your time staying in this recently renovated apartment, dating back to 2022, you will have access to free WiFi. The apartment has family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

All units at the apartment complex come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units include bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the vicinity of the property. A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 2.4 km from Travel Habitat Benimaclet Vista Hermosa Suites, while Church of Saint Nicolás is 3.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Malvarrosa Apartamentos
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Located in Valencia, just 600 metres from Malvarrosa Beach, Malvarrosa Apartamentos provides beachfront accommodation with a shared lounge and free WiFi. The air-conditioned accommodation is 800 metres from Patacona Beach. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.2 km from Playa de las Arenas.

The spacious apartment features 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The property offers garden views.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Valencia, like fishing.

Puerto de Valencia is 3.3 km from Malvarrosa Apartamentos, while Jardines de Monforte is 5.2 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Piso cerca universidades y de la playa
description:
Situated in Valencia, 700 metres from Playa de las Arenas and 1.4 km from Patacona Beach, Piso cerca universidades y de la playa offers air conditioning. The property features city views and is 1.9 km from Puerto de Valencia and 4.6 km from Jardines de Monforte. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Malvarrosa Beach is 500 metres away.

The spacious apartment has a balcony, 2 bedrooms, a living room and a well-equipped kitchen. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Turia Gardens is 4.9 km from the apartment, while L'Oceanografic is 5.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from Piso cerca universidades y de la playa.

name: Blanq Comedias
description:
Set in the heart of Valencia, Blanq Comedias features accommodation with city views, just 200 metres from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and 600 metres from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. The property is situated less than 1 km from Church of Saint Nicolás, 4.4 km from Puerto de Valencia and 4.6 km from L'Oceanografic. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi is available throughout the property.

The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At the guest house, the units come with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Turia Gardens, Norte Train Station and Jardines de Monforte. The nearest airport is Valencia, 9 km from Blanq Comedias, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Apartamentos con encanto en pleno casco antiguo RON VALENCIAYOLE
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom
description:
Apartamentos con encanto en pleno casco antiguo RON VALENCIAYOLE is situated in the Ciutat Vella district of Valencia, 300 metres from Church of Saint Nicolás, 1.3 km from Turia Gardens and 400 metres from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. This guest house features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi. The property is 50 metres from the city centre and 1 km from Norte Train Station.

Each unit includes a private bathroom, while some rooms include a balcony and others also boast a city view.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Jardines de Monforte and Valencia Silk Exchange. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from Apartamentos con encanto en pleno casco antiguo RON VALENCIAYOLE.

name: HQ Rooms Apartments San Vicente
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
Located in Valencia, HQ Rooms Apartments San Vicente features accommodation with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a kitchen. Complimentary WiFi is featured.

Each unit has a dishwasher, oven, a coffee machine, as well as a microwave and kettle. There is a private bathroom with bath in all units, along with free toiletries and a hair dryer.

A bicycle rental service is available at this property and cycling can be enjoyed nearby.

Mercado Central, Valencia is 1.5 km from HQ Rooms Apartments San Vicente. Valencia Airport is 10 km away.

name: Vincci Lys
description:
Vincci Lys offers spacious, elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and minibars. Situated in the centre of Valencia, it is only 300 metres from Valencia Train Station and Valencia Town Hall.

Each of the Vincci’s air-conditioned rooms is soundproofed and offers elegant, classical-style décor. Rooms also feature a pillow menu and a safe. The private bathroom offers toiletries and a hairdryer.

Vincci Lys offers a varied buffet breakfast daily which includes gluten-free products. The hotel has Room Service for guests.

Early check-in and late check-out are available upon request, as well as meeting and conference facilities.

The Vincci Lys offers on-site parking with direct access to the hotel. The hotel is set on a quiet pedestrian street a short walk from shops and restaurants.

It is a 10-minute walk to Valencia Cathedral. Xàtiva Metro Station, 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, offers direct services to Valencia Airport.

name: Maritime House Valencia Beach
description_short: Entire holiday home • 3 bedrooms • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 160m²
description:
Situated within the Poblats Maritims district in Valencia, Maritime House Valencia Beach has air conditioning, a balcony, and quiet street views. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features a concierge service, private check-in and check-out and organising tours for guests.

The spacious holiday home has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with inner courtyard views. A private entrance leads guests into the holiday home, where they can enjoy some wine or champagne. The property has an outdoor dining area.

There is a coffee shop and lounge.

Guests at the holiday home will be able to enjoy activities in and around Valencia, like walking tours and pub crawls. If you would like to discover the area, cycling, fishing and hiking are possible in the surroundings and Maritime House Valencia Beach can arrange a bicycle rental service.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Playa de las Arenas, Malvarrosa Beach and Patacona Beach. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 12 km from Maritime House Valencia Beach.

name: Habitación céntrica de Lujo Gv 3
description:
Situated in Valencia, less than 1 km from Norte Train Station and a 10-minute walk from Turia Gardens, Habitación céntrica de Lujo Gv 3 features air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. The property is located 3.6 km from L'Oceanografic, 3.7 km from Puerto de Valencia and 5.3 km from Bioparc Valencia. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts.

Towels and bed linen are available in the homestay.

Popular points of interest near the homestay include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Jardines de Monforte and Church of Saint Nicolás. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from Habitación céntrica de Lujo Gv 3.

name: Hotel Kramer
description:
The Hotel Kramer is situated 3.5 km from the centre of Valencia, 300 metres from Turia Metro Station. It features a bar, rooms with satellite TV and free WiFi access throughout.

The Hotel Kramer features simple décor and wooden flooring. Its air-conditioned rooms have TV with international channels, bathrooms with amenities and a safety deposit box.

Guests can make use of the hotel’s 24-hour reception and luggage storage. Staff at the tour desk can provide information on Valencia and arrange car, or bicycle rental.

The hotel is just over 1 km from Valencia’s Exhibition Centre and the famous City of Arts and Sciences is a 15-minute drive away. The city’s airport is less than 10 km away.

name: Opera House Valencia B&B
description:
Set in Valencia, Opera House Valencia B&B features a shared lounge. The property is around 1.4 km from City of Arts & Sciences, 1.9 km from Turia Gardens and 1.8 km from Oceanografic. Free WiFi is available.

At the hostel, rooms have a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Opera House Valencia B&B offers certain units with pool views, and all rooms include a private bathroom.

A continental breakfast is served each morning at the Panateria.

Puerto de Valencia is 3 km from the accommodation, while Mercado Central, Valencia is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from Opera House Valencia B&B.

The hostel is on the first floor of the Gulliver Building.

name: Apartamentos Turia
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 120m²
description:
Located in Valencia’s historic Carmen neighbourhood, Apartamentos Turia offers modern, fully-equipped apartments with free Wi-Fi. Ángel Guimera Metro Station is just 10 minutes’ walk away.

Apartamentos Turia’s air-conditioned apartments feature a modern décor with parquet or stone floors. The spacious living room has 2 large sofas and large windows opening out onto a small balcony. The kitchen includes a dishwasher, washing machine and tea or coffee-making facilities.

There are plenty of bars, restaurants and shops within 5-10 minutes’ walk of the apartments.

Many of the city's main sights and attractions are within walking distance of the apartments. The Valencian Institute of Modern Art, the Botanical Garden and Natural History Museum are all a 5-minute walk away. The Cathedral and Town Hall are about 15 minutes’ walk away.

The Estació del Nord Train Station is 20 minutes’ walk away and Valencia Airport is 9.5 km away. Private on-site parking is available at an additional cost upon availability.

name: Small and Cozy Rooms - G
description_short: Entire studio • 1 bathroom • 28m²
description:
Offering city views, Small and Cozy Rooms - G is an accommodation situated in Valencia, 2.7 km from Church of Saint Nicolás and 3.7 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. This apartment also has a private pool. Jardines de Monforte is 3.7 km from the apartment and Turia Gardens is 3.8 km away.

Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning and features a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining area, and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while certain rooms come with a terrace. At the apartment complex, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 4 km from the apartment, while Bioparc Valencia is 4.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 10 km from Small and Cozy Rooms - G.

name: Reinapart Patacona Beachfront Seaview
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 120m²
description:
Reinapart Patacona Beachfront Seaview is a beachfront property located in Valencia, a few steps from Patacona Beach and 400 metres from Malvarrosa Beach. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Playa de las Arenas is 1.5 km from the apartment and Puerto de Valencia is 4.2 km away.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with sea views. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Jardines de Monforte is 5.9 km from the apartment, while Turia Gardens is 6.2 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 18 km from Reinapart Patacona Beachfront Seaview.

name: Brand New Apartment With Super Comfortable Beds
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 120m²
description:
Featuring accommodation with a balcony, Brand New Apartment With Super Comfortable Beds is located in Valencia. It is set 3.7 km from Church of Saint Nicolás and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Norte Train Station is 1.8 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Turia Gardens is 4.2 km from the apartment, while González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 4.3 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from Brand New Apartment With Super Comfortable Beds.

name: Apartamento cerca de la Ciudad de las Ciencias
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 70m²
description:
Set in Valencia, 1.9 km from Puerto de Valencia and 3 km from Jardines de Monforte, Apartamento cerca de la Ciudad de las Ciencias offers air conditioning. It is located 3.5 km from Norte Train Station and offers a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Turia Gardens is 1.6 km away.

The spacious apartment has 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a patio with inner courtyard views. A private entrance leads guests into the apartment, where they can enjoy some chocolates or cookies. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

L'Oceanografic is 3.8 km from the apartment, while González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from Apartamento cerca de la Ciudad de las Ciencias.

name: Hospes Palau de La Mar
description:
Set in a 19th-century building, Hospes Palau de La Mar features a striking lobby, a spa and restaurant. Located in Valencia's Eixample Noble district, it is a 15-minute walk from the city's AVE Railway Station.

The Hospes Palau de la Mar has elegant, modern rooms with queen-size beds and marble bathrooms.

Wi-Fi is available in rooms and public areas. These include an interior patio. Traditional recipes using local produce and fresh fish are available at the gourmet restaurant.

The Palau de la Mar’s Spa has 3 massage and treatment rooms. A hot tub, a sauna and a Turkish bath are also included. There is also a small gym.

Valencia’s cathedral and surrounding old town are within 10 minutes' walk of the Hospes Palau, while the City of Arts and Sciences is 2 km away. There is also easy access to the Lonja, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

name: Hotel Sabbia by Gabbeach
description:
Hotel Sabbia by Gabbeach brings a 360º proposal for your stay with high quality shows with dancers and live music.

This stylish, design hotel is located next to Valencia's Las Arenas Beach, and it is just one minute's walk from Valencia Harbour.

The themed rooms at Hotel Sabbia by Gabbeach feature unique, contemporary decor. All have a TV and bathroom. Some offer a terrace, sea or garden views and spa bath or shower. All have free fast broadband internet connection via WiFi and cable.

Breakfast is served daily and the Sabbia by Gabbeach restaurant offers a fusion of modern international and Spanish cuisine. The hotel also has a pub which closes at 03:00. The property offers banquet facilities and meeting rooms.

There are a number of bars, restaurants and shops on the same street as the Sabbia by Gabbeach.

At Sabbia by Gabbeach we practice Hatha Yoga under the sun rays and the sea breeze.

Buses to the centre pass from a stop opposite the hotel, and the Ciutat de les Arts i les Ciències is 3 km away. Ferries to Mallorca, Menorca and Ibiza all leave from the port. The Sabbia by Gabbeach is 300 metres from the Marina Real Tram Stop and Metro Station.

name: Central Market -C las Cestas- Ciutat Vella
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 90m²
description:
Situated in the centre of Valencia, 800 metres from Norte Train Station and 600 metres from Church of Saint Nicolás, Central Market -C las Cestas- Ciutat Vella offers free WiFi and air conditioning. All rooms boast a kitchen and a private bathroom. Jardines de Monforte is 1.7 km away and Bioparc Valencia is 4.5 km from the apartment.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Turia Gardens, González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from Central Market -C las Cestas- Ciutat Vella.

name: Bet Apartments - Viveros Apartments
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 50m²
description:
Situated in Valencia, a 15-minute walk from Facultat Metro Station and right next to Viveros Park, Bet Apartments - Viveros Apartments features a shared indoor pool and offers apartments with free WiFi.

Air-conditioned and heated, the apartments include a seating area with a flat-screen TV. Each also has a kitchen, equipped with a washing machine, hob, and microwave.

There is a private bathroom in each apartment and it includes a hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are provided.

Estacio del Nord Train Station is a 25-minute walk from the property. City of Arts and Sciences can be reached in 7 minutes by car, and a 25-minute tram ride takes you to Malvarrosa Beach.

name: BRAND NEW, Modern & Stylish Apartment
description_short: Entire apartment • 3 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 120m²
description:
Boasting accommodation with a balcony, BRAND NEW, Modern & Stylish Apartment is situated in Valencia. It is located 3.7 km from Church of Saint Nicolás and features a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Norte Train Station is 1.8 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 3 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 2 bathrooms with a bidet and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Turia Gardens is 4.2 km from the apartment, while González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from BRAND NEW, Modern & Stylish Apartment.

name: Valenciaflats Ciudad de las Ciencias
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Holiday apartments, 100 metres from The City of Arts and Sciences. Aparthotel Valenciaflats Ciudad de las Ciencias offers 40 holiday apartments with 3 different types of serviced apartments from 2 up to 6 people.

Holiday apartments are spacious, modern, fully equipped with HD Led 32-inch TV with international channels and free WiFi Internet. A cleaning service is available for a surcharge.

Aparthotel Valenciaflats Ciudad de las Ciencias has 24-hour reception with a personalized attention. The property has a bar-restaurant which serves buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner from 07:30 until 00:00 without closing

The apartments are within walking distance of several restaurants and bars. The centre of Valencia is around 20 minutes’ walk away and sights such as the city’s Cathedral and bull ring are less than 3 km from the apartments. The nearest beach can be reached in 10 minutes, by bus.

name: APARTAMENTO PLAZA AYUNTAMIENTO VALENCIA CIUTAT VELLA
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 2 bathrooms • 1 kitchen • 120m²
description:
In a central area of Valencia, set within a short distance of Norte Train Station and Church of Saint Nicolás, APARTAMENTO PLAZA AYUNTAMIENTO VALENCIA CIUTAT VELLA offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. Featuring a lift, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The property is soundproof and is situated 1.4 km from Turia Gardens.

The spacious apartment comes with 2 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and dishwasher, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment. This apartment is allergy-free and non-smoking.

As an added convenience, the apartment offers packed lunches for guests to bring on excursions and other trips off-property.

Sightseeing tours are available in the neighbourhood.

Popular points of interest near APARTAMENTO PLAZA AYUNTAMIENTO VALENCIA CIUTAT VELLA include González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and Jardines de Monforte. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Vincci Mercat
description:
Featuring a restaurant and bar on site, Vincci Mercat is located in Valencia, less than 100 metres from the city’s Central Market. This hotel offers free Wi-Fi throughout and a rooftop terrace with a mini swimming pool and views of the old city.

Each air-conditioned room in this hotel has a flat-screen TV, wardrobe, safe, minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower, free toiletries, and a hairdryer.

You can find several restaurants and bars within a 5-minute walk of Vincci Mercat. Valencia Cathedral is 600 metres from the property, and the City of Arts and Sciences is 3 km away.

name: Dau Studios
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 35m²
description:
Surrounded by views of the city, Dau Studios is a sustainable apartment in Valencia, offering guests an environmentally friendly accommodation close to Playa de las Arenas. The property is around 2.2 km from Patacona Beach, 1.2 km from Puerto de Valencia and 4 km from L'Oceanografic. The property offers soundproof units and is set 1.1 km from Malvarrosa Beach.

The apartment complex will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while certain rooms here will provide you with a balcony. At the apartment complex, the units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

If you would rather not eat out, you can make use of the kitchen facilities, which include a toaster, kettle and a fridge.

A bicycle rental service is available at the apartment.

Turia Gardens is 5 km from Dau Studios, while Jardines de Monforte is 5.2 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Piso familiar cerca del centro, AC y Wifi gratis (PA)
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 95m²
description:
Piso familiar cerca del centro, AC y Wifi gratis (PA) has air-conditioned guest accommodation in Valencia, 3.1 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, 3.1 km from Jardines de Monforte and 3.2 km from Turia Gardens. Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, units have bed linen and towels.

Puerto de Valencia is 6.7 km from the apartment, while L'Oceanografic is 6.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from Piso familiar cerca del centro, AC y Wifi gratis (PA).

name: GuestReady - Mezzanine comfort in Valencia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 50m²
description:

The property is set 4.6 km from Norte Train Station, 5.1 km from Bioparc Valencia and 5.9 km from Puerto de Valencia. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Jardines de Monforte is 1.4 km away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a balcony with city views. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Church of Saint Nicolás, González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and Serranos Towers. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from GuestReady - Mezzanine comfort in Valencia.

name: Casa Mila
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 bathroom • 60m²
description:
Situated in the centre of Valencia, 500 metres from Church of Saint Nicolás and less than 1 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Casa Mila offers free WiFi, a terrace and air conditioning. With inner courtyard views, this accommodation features a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.5 km from Jardines de Monforte.

This apartment has 2 bedrooms, a kitchen, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom with a shower. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Turia Gardens, González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and Norte Train Station. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from Casa Mila.

name: Helen Berger Boutique Hotel
description:
Conveniently set in the centre of Valencia, Helen Berger Boutique Hotel provides air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available.

At the hotel, each room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms are equipped with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

Popular points of interest near Helen Berger Boutique Hotel include González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and Turia Gardens. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotelito Boutique Valencia Estación
description:
Hotelito Boutique Valencia Estación is set in the Extramurs district of Valencia, 1.7 km from Church of Saint Nicolás, 3 km from Turia Gardens and 1.4 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. It is situated 1.7 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and offers luggage storage space. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Norte Train Station is 700 metres away.

At the apartment complex, the units come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Units include a coffee machine, while some rooms come with a fully equipped kitchen with an oven, a microwave and a stovetop. The units at the apartment complex feature air conditioning and a wardrobe.

Jardines de Monforte is 3.6 km from the apartment, while Bioparc Valencia is 4.6 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from Hotelito Boutique Valencia Estación.

name: Limin Hostel Capsules
description:

description:
Offering an on-site restaurant, Habitaciones Barra89 is located in Valencia. Set 400 metres from Patraix Metro Station, this property offers single and double rooms with free WiFi.

All rooms in this guest house are heated and will provide you with a TV and fan, and all rooms include a desk and a minibar. Bed linen and towels are provided, and there are shared bathrooms with a shower.

Valencia Nord Train Station is a 15-minute drive from Habitaciones Barra89, and you can reach Valencia Historic Centre in 3 metro stops. Valencia Airport is 8 km away.

name: Apartamentos Río Turia
description_short: Entire apartment • 1 bedroom • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 27m²
description:
Apartamentos Río Turia features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Valencia, 2 km from Church of Saint Nicolás, 1.9 km from Bioparc Valencia and 3.4 km from Norte Train Station. Among the facilities at this property are private check-in and check-out and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The apartment has private entrance.

The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchen has a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. A toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the apartment complex, each unit includes bed linen and towels.

Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 3.9 km from the apartment, while Jardines de Monforte is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 6 km from Apartamentos Río Turia.

name: Art&Flats Hostel
description_short: 2 beds in dormitories
description:
Situated 300 meters from Central Market of Valencia and in the city center, Art&Flats Bed&Breakfast features accommodation with a shared lounge, a terrace and a shared kitchen for your convenience. Complimentary WiFi is offered throughout the property. The property is located 100 meters from the town hall.

All units are fitted with air conditioning, and some have a flat-screen TV, washing machine, a kettle, completed with a kitchen.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and Church of Saint Nicolás. The nearest airport is Valencia, 10 km from Art&Flats Bed&Breakfast, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The POD Suite Hostel
description_short: Bed in dormitory • 35m²
description:
Situated in Valencia, less than 1 km from Jardines de Monforte, The POD Suite Hostel features air-conditioned accommodation and a shared lounge. Located around 1.2 km from Turia Gardens, the hostel with free WiFi is also 2.5 km away from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. Church of Saint Nicolás is 4.2 km from the hostel and Puerto de Valencia is 4.3 km away.

All rooms have a shared bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen.

Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 2.5 km from the hostel, while Norte Train Station is 3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from The POD Suite Hostel.

name: Residencia Universitaria Trinitarios
description:
Attractively situated in the centre of Valencia, Residencia Universitaria Trinitarios features air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge and free WiFi. The property is situated 600 metres from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, 1.5 km from Norte Train Station and 800 metres from Church of Saint Nicolás. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen and a concierge service for guests.

At the hostel, the rooms are equipped with a desk. Rooms have a coffee machine and a private bathroom, while certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. At Residencia Universitaria Trinitarios every room comes with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Jardines de Monforte and Turia Gardens. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 10 km from Residencia Universitaria Trinitarios.

name: Habitación bien situada, cómoda y nueva
description:
Located in Valencia, 3.3 km from Jardines de Monforte and 3.3 km from Church of Saint Nicolás, Habitación bien situada, cómoda y nueva offers free WiFi and air conditioning. This recently renovated homestay is located 3.7 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and 3.8 km from Turia Gardens. Staff on-site can arrange a shuttle service.

Each unit is equipped with a microwave, toaster, a coffee machine, as well as a fridge and kettle. Some accommodation includes a terrace with quiet street views, a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom with bidet. At the homestay, every unit includes bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available in the surroundings.

González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 4.1 km from the homestay, while Bioparc Valencia is 5.2 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia, 12 km from Habitación bien situada, cómoda y nueva, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hostal Restaurant El Poligono
description:
Hostal Restaurant El Poligono provides air-conditioned rooms in Valencia. This guest house offers a terrace as well as a bar. Free WiFi is included throughout the property.

At the guest house, all units include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units will provide guests with a fridge.

The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 60 km from the guest house.

name: Zerka Sendra
description_short: Entire apartment • 2 bedrooms • 1 living room • 1 bathroom • 1 kitchen • 80m²
description:
In the centre of Valencia, located within a short distance of Church of Saint Nicolás and Norte Train Station, Zerka Sendra offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a fridge and kettle. It is situated 1.8 km from Jardines de Monforte and provides a lift. The property is non-smoking and is set 700 metres from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados.

The spacious apartment is equipped with 2 separate bedrooms, 1 bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area and microwave, and a living room with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Turia Gardens, González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and Valencia Silk Exchange. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from Zerka Sendra.

name: Red Nest Hostel
description_short: 2 beds in dormitories
description:
The modern Red Nest Hostel is located in central Valencia, 5 minutes’ walk from Colón Metro Station. It offers spacious, colourful rooms with free lockers, free bed linen, and free WiFi.

There is a large kitchen with microwaves and kettles, as well as a dining area. There is also a work station with internet access. Reception is open 24 hours, and offers free luggage storage.

The Red Nest Hostel has a games room, and the top floor has a chill-out area and pool table. You can also listen to music or watch the TV or a DVD.

Red Nest Hostel is located just 5 minutes’ walk from the shops of Calle Colón. There is a bus stop outside the property.

name: Urban Youth Hostel
description_short: 2 beds in dormitories
description:
Urban Youth Hostel in Valencia provides adults-only accommodation with a restaurant, a bar and a shared lounge. Around 1.3 km from Playa de las Arenas, the property is 1.9 km away from Malvarrosa Beach, 500 metres from the nearest Metro Station, Maritim-Serrería, and a 20-minute walk from the City of Arts and Science.

All rooms at the Youth Hostel are bright and overlook the street. Some come with a spacious terrace. Each bed has its locker, individual plug and a reading lamp. Extra lockers can be rented from reception.

Urban Youth Hostel features a modern bar in the ground floor serving national and international dishes. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared kitchen, a shared lounge and a games room. There is a self-service washing and drying service.

You can reach Valencia Airport in 40 minutes by public transport. The hostel is just 600 metres from Valencia Harbour.

name: Home Youth Hostel by Feetup Hostels
description_short: 2 beds in dormitories
description:
This recently restored building in central Valencia has free Wi-Fi, and is the only hostel in Valencia to offer single beds, instead of bunks, in its dormitories.

Make yourself at home in the fully smoke-free environment of the Hôme Youth Hostel. Guests have access to free tea and coffee until midnight.

The modern, air-conditioned rooms combine full beds and traditional ceramic floors, with contemporary art deco.

Wander right out into the heart of Valencia - the Hôme Youth Hostel is just metres from sights such as the Cathedral and central market.

You can enjoy a guided visit thanks to the hostel's tour desk, or rent a bicycle at reception to explore the city on your own.

Share photos with your friends back at home, using the free Wi-Fi access.

Make the most of 24-hour reception and the Hôme Youth Hostel's central location to sample Valencia's buzzing nightlife.

name: Cantagua Hostel
description_short: 2 beds in dormitories
description:
Situated conveniently in the Quatre Carreres district of Valencia, Cantagua Hostel is situated 3 km from Turia Gardens, 1.9 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and 3.3 km from Jardines de Monforte. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from Norte Train Station.

At the hostel, all rooms come with a patio. Complete with a private bathroom, the units at Cantagua Hostel come with air conditioning, and selected rooms here will provide you with a seating area. All rooms at the accommodation are fitted with a shared bathroom and bed linen.

Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 3.3 km from Cantagua Hostel, while Church of Saint Nicolás is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 10 km from the hostel.

name: Purple Nest Hostel
description_short: 2 beds in dormitories
description:
Located in the centre of Valencia, just 10 minutes’ walk from the cathedral, Purple Nest Hostel offers bright, air-conditioned rooms. It has free WiFi, a roof terrace and a lively bar.

Rooms are decorated in cheerful, vibrant colours, with tiled floors and original designs painted on the walls. Guests use shared bathrooms and towels are provided.

Purple Nest Hostel has computers with internet that can be used for an extra charge. The hostel features vending machines, and free coffee and tea is offered.

The Purple Nest is a great base for exploring the sights of Valencia and enjoying its nightlife. The bus station is around 2 km away, and the bus for the beach stops close to the hostel.

name: HotSpot Valencia
description_short: Bed in dormitory
description:
Situated conveniently in the Ciutat Vella district of Valencia, HotSpot Valencia is set 800 metres from Church of Saint Nicolás, 1.7 km from Turia Gardens and less than 1 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The property is situated less than 1 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, 3.2 km from Jardines de Monforte and 4.8 km from Bioparc Valencia. The property is 500 metres from the city centre and less than 1 km from Norte Train Station.

Featuring a shared bathroom with a bidet and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also have free WiFi, while selected rooms will provide you with a city view. The units feature bed linen.

L'Oceanografic is 5.8 km from HotSpot Valencia, while Puerto de Valencia is 6.2 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: BIZZBEACH
description_short: 2 shared dormitory rooms
description:
Situated in Valencia, BIZZBEACH features air-conditioned accommodation and a bar. The property is around less than 1 km from L'Oceanografic, a 13-minute walk from City of Arts & Sciences and 2.5 km from Turia Gardens. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi is available.

There are popular points of interest include Venecia, Rafalcaid and Puerto de Valencia. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 12 km from BIZZBEACH.

name: Livensa Living Studios Valencia Marina Real
description_short: 2 entire studios • 2 bathrooms • 2 kitchens
description:
1.5 km from Playa de las Arenas, Livensa Living Studios Valencia Marina Real is a sustainable property situated in Valencia and features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. Located in the Poblats Maritims district, the property provides guests with access to a fitness room. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a lift and luggage storage for guests.

At the apartment complex, every unit is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units have a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and fridge. At the apartment complex, all units are fitted with a seating area.

For guests with children, the apartment provides outdoor play equipment. An indoor play area is also available at Livensa Living Studios Valencia Marina Real, while guests can also relax on the sun terrace.

Malvarrosa Beach is 2.2 km from the accommodation, while Puerto de Valencia is less than 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from Livensa Living Studios Valencia Marina Real.

name: UP Hostel Valencia
description_short: 2 beds in dormitories
description:
UP Hostel Valencia is located in Valencia, within the North Train Station, and next to Valencia Bullring and city hall. It is located 1.2 km from Barrio del Carmen and a 20-minute walk from Turia Gardens.

This property offers beds in dormitories with bunk beds for 16 people, including private lockers and access to shared bathroom facilities. Bed linen are provided.

Breakfast includes croissants, toast, butter and jam, cereals as well as coffee, tea and juice.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and shops within a 5-minute walk of UP Hostel Valencia. Oceanografic is 30 minutes away by bus, while Bioparc Valencia is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from UP Hostel Valencia.

name: Coworking Balance
description_short: 2 beds in dormitories
description:
Set in Valencia, within 1.5 km of Turia Gardens and 1.9 km of Jardines de Monforte, Coworking Balance offers accommodation with a garden and a terrace, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 2.8 km from Puerto de Valencia, 3.2 km from Norte Train Station and 3.7 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. Church of Saint Nicolás is 5.2 km from the hotel and Bioparc Valencia is 7.6 km away.

Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 3.8 km from the hotel, while L'Oceanografic is 3.8 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from Coworking Balance.

name: Habitaciones privadas en Mislata
description:
Habitaciones privadas en Mislata is situated in Valencia, 3.7 km from Church of Saint Nicolás, 4.9 km from Norte Train Station, and 5.2 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. The air-conditioned accommodation is 1.7 km from Bioparc Valencia. González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 5.5 km from the apartment and L'Oceanografic is 8 km away.

With a shared bathroom, units at the apartment complex also feature free WiFi.

Jardines de Monforte is 5.2 km from the apartment, while Turia Gardens is 5.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 4 km from Habitaciones privadas en Mislata.

name: Feetup Home Backpackers Valencia
description_short: Bed in dormitory • 47m²
description:
Feetup Home Backpackers Valencia is situated at the heart of the lively El Carmen district in Valencia.

Rooms include free WiFi and access to the shared bathrooms. The hostel also includes a lounge area with an internet point and a shared kitchen which is well equipped. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Feetup Home Backpackers Valencia also has a social area with a bar, where guests can talk and know each other. Staff at the 24-hour reception can offer tourist information and luggage storage.

Valencia Cathedral and La Lonja are both under 10 minutes' walk away. Valencia Bus Station can be reached in 20 minutes' walk.

name: NAP v
description_short: 2 beds in dormitories
description:
Located in Valencia and with Turia Gardens reachable within 700 metres, NAP v provides concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. Norte Train Station is 2.1 km from the hotel and Puerto de Valencia is 3.4 km away.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Jardines de Monforte, González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 10 km from NAP v.
